verbose_text: As a negatively charged sulphated polysaccharide, Dextran sulphate (DS, Figure XREF_FIG) inhibit the attachment and entry course as well as the HA dependent XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR and NA dependent XREF_BIBR fusion course (strictly speaking, DS is not a small molecular).
evidence: sulphate (DS, Figure  XREF_FIG ) inhibit the attachment and entry course as well as the HA-dependent  XREF_BIBR ,  XREF_BIBR  and NA
